name: Radiant Gardens
description:
Loss is never just an end - for everyone else, it is a new beginning. Push onward and claim your life anew!

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to Move
  • Left Click to Interact & Navigate Menus

Tips:

  • Click the moon to advance time
  • Flowers grow best in groups of three
  • If you are too tired to plant a flower, you can always lay it at her place of rest
